notesStmt.note: Usage stains. Folios 304-305 mutilated. Incomplete at the beginning.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Mikhlol מכלול Ba῾al kenafayim בעל כנפים

supportDesc.foliation: Original Hebrew foliation, starting with no. 40.

collation.p: 35 quires of mostly 8 or 10 leaves each, marked with signatures at the beginning and at the end (partly preserved), and with catchwords (at the end of each column) at the end of the quires.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi (North African) semi-cursive script of the 14th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'David Kimchi. Sepher Ham-Mikhlol. Joseph Ben Chaiyim. Ba'al Kenaphayim. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental Ms. 1022.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Purchased by the British Museum from Samuel Schönblum: inscribed, folio [306v] (fse001v).
